name: Banana bread
author: Pooja
description: Classic banana bread, perfect for using up old bananas.

actions.step: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease 9x5 inch pan
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
Combine butter and brown sugar in a separate bowl.
Add mashed bananas and eggs to brown sugar mixture. Stir until well blended.
Add banana mixture to flour mixture. Stir to moisten. DO NOT OVERMIX.
Pour batter into pan. Bake for 60 - 65 minutes.
